response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us, reflecting its high quality, unique features, and the effort put into its creation. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $10,000. I believe this offer presents an excellent value for what we are confident will be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.", "product_price": 10000}
